cards.name: Deft Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage twice.
Positive Dexterity increases the damage of this card.

cards.name: Poise
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Negative Dexterity and Frail do not affect this card.

cards.name: Wicked Gift
cards.description:
Discard a card.
If it is a Skill,
apply 2 Vulnerable.
If it is a non-Skill card, apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Condition
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you draw or discard a 0-cost Attack, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Decoy
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, gain 8 (11) Block.

cards.name: Improvise
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 2 (3) non-Green Skills to add into your hand.
Retain it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Invisible Threads
cards.description:
Shuffle up to 3 cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Petrify
cards.description:
Deal 16 (20) damage.
Enemy prevents
the next time it would lose HP.

cards.name: Poison Cocktail
cards.description: Discard 3 cards and apply 3 (4) Poison for each card type among them.

cards.name: Poltergeist
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to
a random enemy
3 (4) times.
Draw 3 (4) cards,
then discard them.

cards.name: Ace in the Hole
cards.description:
Retain.
Add 3 (4) Shivs+
into your hand.

cards.name: Adaptive
cards.description:
(Innate.)
The first 1-cost card you play each turn becomes 0-cost until played.

cards.name: Quagmire
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 card for every 2 unique debuffs the enemy has.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unpredictable
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Dexterity.
At the start of your turn, exchange your Strength and Dexterity.

keywords.name: Stealth
keywords.description: As long as you are in Stealth, you have 3 additional Dexterity. Lose 1 Stealth whenever you play a Skill.
